tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE ingredients(ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), allergy_information TEXT);
CREATE TABLE allergies(allergy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, allergy_name VARCHAR(255), allergy_description TEXT, ingredient_id INT REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id));

CREATE TABLE ingredient_category_mapping (
    ingredient_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (ingredient_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredient_allergies(ingredient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES ingredient_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ingredient_allergy_info (
    ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    allergy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    allergy_severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    allergy_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_ingredient_id FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
    recipe_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    unit VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_recipe_id FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_ingredient_id FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id)
);
